title: Breaking rules information
description: Information about operations performed outside regular trading hours
$comment: This schema captures details about operations that occur outside the defined trading hours, including responsibility and justification for such operations

breakingRuleIndicator.description: Indicates if the operation was requested outside the time limit
breakingRuleIndicator.$comment: When true, indicates a breaking rule that requires justification

breakingRuleDelayResponsibility.description: Indicates which participant is responsible for the breaking rule operation
breakingRuleDelayResponsibility.$comment: Required when breakingRuleIndicator is true. True indicates the current participant is responsible, false indicates the counterparty is responsible

breakingRuleReason.description: Justification for the breaking rule operation
breakingRuleReason.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalBreakingRuleReasonCode. Required when breakingRuleIndicator is true
